DataElement.preferredName: Patient Inadequate Hepatic Function Assessment Ind-2
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicates yes/no as to whether a patient has inadequate hepatic or hematologic function.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Whether a patient has inadequate hepatic or hematologic function.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: Not meeting a quantitative or qualitative measure necessary for a requirement.:Refers to the liver.:Function; what something is used for.:The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: Not meeting a quantitative or qualitative measure necessary for a requirement.
Pertaining to, affecting, or associated with the liver.
The normal action performed by a structure or device.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default conceptual domain for all cancer treatment trials
ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: 10.14.20 TL changed WFS from RELEASED-NON-CMPLNT to RETIRED ARCHIVED per Brian Campbell and added an End Date in preparation of OneData.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has inadequate hepatic or hem
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has inadequate hepatic or hematological function: (unless lymphoma related) a. Bilirubin > 2 mg/dl (total) except > 5 mg/dl in patients with Gilbert's syndrome as defined by > 80% unconjugated  b. ANC <1000  c. Platelets < 75,000

DataElement.changeDescription: Replaced VD Labs Ind-2  2181518v1.0 with VD ID#3506068 - Yes No Indicator - dbw
